name: Jane Huffman
bio: Jane Huffman grew up outside of Detroit, Michigan. She earned a BA from Kalamazoo College and an MFA in poetry from the University of Iowa Writers' Workshop. Her poems have appeared in Poetry magazine, the New Yorker, FIELD, The Iowa Review, and elsewhere. In 2019 she was awarded a Ruth Lilly and Dorothy Sargent Rosenberg Poetry Fellowship from the Poetry Foundation. She is editor-in-chief of Guesthouse and teaches at the University of Iowa.
